content:
When we try to upload the json examples packages to our freshly set up HAPI FHIR Server via HAPI Cli upload-examples the upload of the bundles fails for most of the resources as referenced practicioners or patients seem to be missing. There are also a lot of .diff files in the example packages. We tried the built in downloader which GETS: http://build.fhir.org/examples-json.zip and a manual download from: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/examples-json.zip
Is there a known problem with the examples package at the moment?

There isn't a requirement that references resolve. We do raise warnings in the build process when this happens, but work groups aren't required to address those warnings until their resource hits FMM 3.
(Creating and maintaining examples is a large amount of work, so we don't impose overly tight expectations when resources are still undergoing significant change.)
thanks for the clarification, as the CLI uploader uses these examples and therefore fails at the moment i'll open a issue for hapi-cli
